TopicTitle: Team Fortress 2- Kerbal Mercs (Not really kerbals but still)

Articles.Content:
This is inspired by a post on the Minecraft Forums. I decided to make my own version. Here you go!

RULES :

#1. You must have your class, loadout, and team "application" accepted before you join.

#2. Two actions per host's post. This includes shooting at another player and moving. (If I choose to step down and let someone else govern the thread, they will be put here.)

#3. Real weapons from TF2.

#4. Give detailed positions about yourself. Not just "red battlements".

#5. What I say goes.

#6. If you spend your two movements and die, you respawn with two movements. Same if you've only used one.

#7. No health kits. Only medics, dispencers, and resupply works.

#8. One action to reload. Only one. You can also move during that action.

#9. One action to half-upgrade a building (100 metal). Also, if I know there's an ammo near your buildings, you can use them.

#10. No double posting.
